_header: The sicker sooth who so says
_description: The Four Foes of Mankind — seven 16-line stanzas (aaabcccbdddbeeeb)

NLS1921.First Lines:
Þe siker soþe who so seysWiþ diol dreye we our
                    days…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Now haue y founden þi fasFinde tow þi
                    frendes
